alert.note: Alert for Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Hanover and northeastern Brunswick Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Leland, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Leland, Northwest, Bishop, Hightsville, Wrightsboro, Batarora, Town Creek, Phoenix, Winnabow, Silver Lake, Wilmington International Airport, Belville, Navassa, Sandy Creek and New Hanover Regional Medical Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 140 US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 36 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
